messages.message: Hello Russia, I am curious as to whether or not you would be content to split Scandinavia equally between yourself, Germany, and me. Does that prospect interest you?
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'Hello Russia, I am curious as to whether or not you would be content to split Scandinavia equally between yourself, Germany, and me. Does that prospect interest you?'.

messages.message:
Hi england! I'm assumimg that you're planning on heading to Nwy, and Germany would go to Denmark. If we could share that would be great! I would preffer if you went there with a fleet instead of a unit. I would be willing to give you unaposed access to Nwy if you agree to this (I won't move Mos-Stp, then Stp-Nor for a stand-off). Looking forwards to a great game with you!
-Russia
messages.input:
Message from RUSSIA:'Hi england! I'm assumimg that you're planning on heading to Nwy, and Germany would go to Denmark. If we could share that would be great! I would preffer if you went there with a fleet instead of a unit. I would be willing to give you unaposed access to Nwy if you agree to this (I won't move Mos-Stp, then Stp-Nor for a stand-off). Looking forwards to a great game with you!
-Russia'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F EDI - NWG, F LON - NTH, A LVP - EDI. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should trust Russia. Russia's proposal seems to be well-aligned with your plan to split Scandinavia equally and demonstrates a willingness to cooperate effectively for mutual benefit. Their suggestion to avoid conflict and offer you unopposed access to Norway displays a harmonious and strategic approach that supports the shared goal of fair distribution of territories.

messages.message: Again, sorry for the stab. In hindsight, I can't really say it was a mistake. Even though I feel bad I REALLY needed the build as Austria and Turkey are running a relentless attack against me. I appreciate you're cooperation. I fear if we go to war, I will be pressured from all sides and will be eliminated. But, that would probably also end the alliance with you and France, and they are looking in a much better position then you right now. So I would really like to continue our alliance. I will move out of Nwy this turn, provided you don't take Sweden.
